q1: Nigeria have a lovely fashionable jersey
a1: Nigeria does have a pretty good looking Jersey.
q2: Would you ever buy a Nigeria kit?
a2: Absolutely. I love that green pattern.
q3: Where can you buy a Jersey like that?
a3: You can buy it on Nike's website.
q5: Does wearing a nice Jersey effect a teams performance?
a5: Yes, scientific studies have shown that the colour of a team's jersey can affect their performance depending on the colour.
